record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - September 17, 2007)

[Page: S11614]

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:12 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, September 18, 2007, at 10 a.m.
